meanings.definition: A group of drugs used in chemotherapy to treat certain types of cancer.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed procarbazines to help fight the cancer cells.
meanings.sent2: Patients undergoing chemotherapy often receive procarbazines to combat the disease.
meanings.sent3: The procarbazines went to battle against the cancer like tiny soldiers.
meanings.sent4: Her body welcomed the procarbazines like brave warriors fighting off the enemy within.
meanings.sent5: The procarbazines acted as a shield, protecting the body from the invading cancer cells.

meanings.definition: The plural form of procarbazine, a medication used to treat Hodgkin's lymphoma.
meanings.sent1: The pharmacy stocked up on procarbazines to meet the demand from patients.
meanings.sent2: Doctors often prescribe procarbazines to help patients with Hodgkin's lymphoma.
meanings.sent3: The procarbazines on the shelf whispered to each other, ready to heal those in need.
meanings.sent4: The procarbazines stood together like a united army, ready to fight the lymphoma battle.
meanings.sent5: Each procarbazine pill was a tiny hero in the fight against Hodgkin's lymphoma.
